title: 我的测试文档
text: RECOMPILE ALL YOUR PLUGINS THAT USE #include <shavit> OR STUFF WILL BREAKshavit’s surf timerHope to replace SurfTimer with this. Map strippers, zones and tiers are from HERE Mapzones Setup Demonstration Requirements: Steam version of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Metamod:Source and SourceMod 1.10 or above installed. A MySQL database (preferably locally hosted) if your database is likely to grow big. MySQL server version of 5.5.5 or above is required. DHooks MomSurfFix RNGFix HeadBugFix Optional requirements, for the best experience: SteamWorks Used to grab {serverip} in advertisements. ShowPlayerClips Stripper Used to fix maps(download git129 or above) Boostfix Prevent client getting double push/boost sm_closestpos Get dynamic time and velocity difference, written in c++ and much faster than sourcepawn

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
